thread.title: Britney Spears honored at annual LGBTQ awards

title: Britney Spears honored at annual LGBTQ awards
text:
Britney Spears honored at annual LGBTQ awards 6:01am IST - 01:36 
Singer Britney Spears spoke out as she was awarded the Vanguard Award at the GLAAD Awards in Beverly Hills. Rough Cut - no reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
